description: I. Letter dated 14/02/2008 from Keith Hill MP to Caroline Flint MP regarding social landlords' directions. II. The Social Landlords Mandatory Reduction of Service Charges (England) Directions 1997. 3 p. III. The Social Landlords Discretionary Reduction of Service Charges (England) Directions 1997. 5 p. IV. Guidance for landlords regarding reducing service charges to leaseholders for maintenance, repairs and improvement. 14 p.
department: Dept for Communities and Local Government
